content: I think "The Silent Companions" could be a great choice for a book club discussion. I'll definitely consider suggesting it to my book club. By the way, I've also been volunteering at a local community center, helping out with a book reading event for kids, which was a lot of fun. It's great to see kids get excited about reading. Do you have any recommendations for kids' books or authors that might be suitable for a reading event like that?
